title: Immigration and citizenship
summary: This page is a general landing page for the Department of Home Affairs focused on immigration and citizenship. It provides links to visa information, citizenship services, travel guidance, support for people affected by international conflicts, and access to online services. It also highlights recent news updates and contact options.

palestine_israel_conflict.description: Information for people impacted by conflict in Palestine or Israel.
palestine_israel_conflict.link_text: Hamas-Israel Conflict: Visa Support and financial assistance

ukraine_conflict.description: Information for people impacted by the situation in Ukraine.
ukraine_conflict.link_text: Offer of a Resolution of Status Visa to Ukrainian Temporary Humanitarian Concern (subclass 786) visa holders

featured_topics.employ_people_from_overseas: See how to bring someone into Australia to work for you
featured_topics.hamas_israel_conflict_support: Find visa information to support those impacted by the Hamas-Israel conflict and surrounding areas
featured_topics.explore_visa_options: Answer a few questions to identify which visas might be suitable for you and your family
featured_topics.online_forms_and_services: Apply, notify us of changes, check status or withdraw an application. Use ImmiAccount or VEVO.
featured_topics.become_a_citizen: See if you are eligible and how to apply
featured_topics.visa_expiry_guidance: See what your options are and what you need to do if your visa is expiring or has expired
featured_topics.changes_to_situation: Information about what to do if your situation has changed (moving, new baby, new passport, plan changes)
featured_topics.visa_conditions: Find out what you can and can't do under your visa conditions
featured_topics.report_suspicious_activities: Report suspicious or illegal immigration, citizenship, customs and trade activity
